intro.dialogue: Yesterday was certainly an interesting encounter. I feel kind of bad for Aaliyah, though. Being stuck in a small lake in the middle of a park probably gets lonely. Not to mention the lack of privacy.
I've decided I'm going to visit her again. She seemed desperate for social interaction, and if talking to her makes her happier, I'll talk to her.
I'd hate to be in her situation; the lack of privacy would eat me alive.
I've been thinking about where to bring her. If she can't leave this park, then her options are limited. I might be able to somehow carry her to a nice spot in the park.
It could be good for her to enjoy something other than that small lake.
Hey love! Such a surprise to see you here! A happy surprise, though.
Yeah, I know. I kept thinking about how lonely you must be staying in that water all the time.
And what's supposed to be wrong about staying in the place that keeps me alive?
Nothing, but I thought you might not get out often, so I wanted to ask you out on a date in the park.
Oh sweetie, that's adorable of you. The thing is, by the time we found a good spot, I'd have to be returning already, or else I'll dry out.
My tentacles have to be wet, and every time I walk, some of that wetness sticks to the ground. That's why I can't go long distances.
Would you be able to have a small date in the park with me if I carried you there so you don't lose too much water by walking there yourself?
I think that might be possible! Are you sure though? I don't want to break your back.
Alright, I'll climb on top of you. Hang on!
Will you make vehicle noises while carrying Aaliyah on your back?

Press W for no.
Press S to make funny train and car noises.

angry.dialogue: Wow, you sure are the life of the party. Here, try that again with W

happy.dialogue: Vroom! Vroooom! Eeeeeek! Beep-beep! Skreeee! Clunk! Swish-swish! Pop-pop! Beep-beep!
I'm making car noises! I'm a human vehicle
You're adorable! Go my little wagon, go!
You better go faster or I'll treat you like a horse and slap your butt to go faster!
Well this is conflicting- I mean yes ma'am
